mapper.select: SELECT equipment_category_no AS equipmentCategoryNo ,value_name AS valueName ,value_merge AS valueMerge ,value_val AS valueVal ,value_borders AS valueBorders ,value_row AS valueRow ,value_cols AS valueCols FROM sheet_value WHERE license_kindergarten=#{licenseKindergarten} AND value_name=#{valueName} ORDER BY value_no DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT equipment_category_no AS equipmentCategoryNo ,value_name AS valueName FROM sheet_value WHERE license_kindergarten = #{licenseKindergarten} ORDER BY value_no DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY equipment_day DESC LIMIT #{countNo};
SELECT category_no AS categoryNo, category_name AS categoryName FROM equipment_category;
SELECT sheet_no AS sheetNo ,teacher_no AS teacherNo ,license_kindergarten AS licenseKindergarten ,sheet_content AS sheetContent FROM sheet_value WHERE teacher_no = #{teacherNo};
